com.iosix.eldblelib

Class EldBroadcast

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.iosix.eldblelib.EldBroadcast
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    EldBufferRecord, EldDataRecord, EldDriverBehaviorRecord, EldEmissionsRecord, EldEngineRecord, EldFuelRecord, EldRawDiagnosticRecord, EldTransmissionRecord

    public class EldBroadcast
extends Object
    Base class for all the records broadcast by the ELD.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String getBroadcastString() 
      EldBroadcastTypes getRecType() 

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • getBroadcastString

        public String getBroadcastString()
        Returns:
        ELD_DATA_RECORD - record is sent in comma delimited format with a terminating in the following order Prefix is "Data: " vin = "" - Vehicle identification string as reported by the PGN rpm = 0.0; - RPM reported by the vehicle speed = 0.0; - Speed in Kilometers per hour odometer=0.0; - Odometer in Kilometers to 3 decimal places tripDistance=0.0; //deleted in latest engineHours=0.0; - Total engine hours reported by the vehicle tripHours=0.0; //deleted in latest voltage=0.0; - Voltage level measured at the power pin on the J1939 port gpsDateTime=new Date(); latitude=0.0; longitude=0.0; gpsSpeed=0; course=0; numSats=0; mslAlt=0; dop=0.0; sequence=0; //deleted in latest firmwareVersion=""; ELD_BUFFER_RECORD - record sent every minute to provide status of cached data on the device record is sent in comma delimited format with a terminating Example record: Buffer: 0,3,4,30349 BUFFER: ,, ELD_CACHED_RECORD - record sent when user sends a REQUEST,seqNO record is sent in comma delimited format with a terminating Examples Poweron Record - Record: Poweron,,,, Engineon Record - Record: Engineon,,, Engineoff Record - Record: Engineoff,,, Periodic Record - Record: Periodic with the following fields rpm - RPM reported by the vehicle speed - Speed in Kilometers per hour odometer - Odometer in Kilometers to 3 decimal places engineHours - Total engine hours reported by the vehicle latitude longitude gpsSpeed course numSats mslAlt dop unixTime sequence

      • getRecType

        public EldBroadcastTypes getRecType()
        Returns:
        Record type
